name: Please Leave (Nox Dev)
description:
Description:

You have leave the game. That is the game, to leave n. The point of the game is to leave the game. This game was also created in only 10 minutes.

Controls:

E key, F key, Enter, Space bar to select.

Features:

You can exit the game, good controls, screen shake, sweet sweet sexy muzak, and great graphics.
